title: Jordan Peele's Nope Review
description:
Tim, Blessing, and Joey give their thoughts on Jordan Peele's third movie Nope starring Daniel Kaluuya, Keke Palmer, and Steven Yeun.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
